This is a quick app designed by the team at Appliance Authority to launch your browser directly to the homepage of our website. 

Appliance Authority is an authoritative magazine website that publishes reviews of Consumer Electronics and Home Appliances - Both Large and Small. These include but are not included to things such as video game systems, televisions, gardening tools, and more.

Our most expensive category is the small appliances category. More specifically, we have half a million words of reviews in the kitchen appliance category. As of right now, we have hundreds of reviews on small appliances including Coffee Makers, Ice Cream Makers, Hand Mixers, Microwaves, Juicers, Blenders, Slow Cookers, Toasters, and tons of other categories. As of the time of this writing, they are all up to date for the 2016 to 2017 shopping season.

Our largest categories when it comes to reviews are the Coffee Makers, Espresso Machines, and French Presses with around fifty thousand words, Epilators at around forty thousand words, Juicers and Blenders at around Thirty Thousand words, and Toasters at around twenty seven thousand words.

So what are you waiting for? Install our app and get ready to hunt for deals on the best consumer goods on the market today.
